OOC: I cant see why you would hate most of them, but whatever. I'm me
and you are you. And yes Hogan did become famous in WWF, as did Scott
Hall. But all the other names I mentioned became famous in NWA/WCW. Even
Nash was Vinnie Vegas in WCW before Diesel in WWF.

And Flair is old now, but he is still the best. Thats why he is a 11
time NWA World Heavyweight Champ, 8 time WCW World Heavyweight Champ,
and 2 time WWF World Heavyweight Champ. And the older wrestlers in WCW
got the gold because they desearved it. 

All I can say is the 4 Horsemen need to come back. A perfect 4 for the
group would be Ric Flair(cause he has always led them), David Flair(he
is Flair's son he desearves the spot), Chris Benoit, and Dean
Malenko.(Since Benoit and Malenko were Horsemen in WCW) Also Arn
Anderson of course. He cant wrestle anymore, but he can be a part of it.
